title: Projects
text:
A study on the potential of formal relational contracts to enhance collaborative governance among local government agencies in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex.



Research on best practices for nonprofit financial management, focusing on funding sources and pay parity.

title: About Me
text:
I’m a PhD student at the University of Texas at Dallas, specializing in Public Affairs. My research interests revolve around collaborative governance, Human Resources, Non-profit management, and Public Administration.



Md Eyasin Ul Islam Pavel (2024). Book Review:
The Politics of Collaborative Public Management: A Primer by Robert Agranoff and Aleksey Kolpakov.
Published in Public Administration, Volume 102, Issue 2, Pages 791-793.
DOI: 10.1111/padm.12990.

title: Welcome to Pavel’s Profile
text:
1 Welcome
Hi, I’m Pavel, a PhD candidate in Public Affairs at the University of Texas at Dallas. My research focuses on collaborative governance, human resources, nonprofit management, and public administration.
Explore my projects, research, and book reviews on this website!
